nodes.text: A drag course used for Podracing existed on the Outer rim desert planet of Tatooine. More difficult than the other drag courses on the planet, it featured sharp turns and tight squeezes in between rocks and cliff-sides. The entirety of the course took place within the deserts of Tatooine. A sandcrawler would occasionally park near the course, providing an obstacle to pilots, albeit a fairly out of the way one. The Gran from Hok, Mawhonic, was favored on this course, and he would challenge other pilots to race against him here.
The course first appeared, unnamed, in the 1999 Gameboy Color video game Star Wars Episode I: Racer.
